lead_paragraph: In this film from Luo Dong, a man and a woman wrestle with the question of leaving China or remaining there.

headline.print_headline: Review: In ‘New York, New York,’ Job Opportunities Complicate a Relationship
headline.main: Review: In ‘New York, New York,’ Job Opportunities Complicate a Relationship

snippet: In this film from Luo Dong, a man and a woman wrestle with the question of leaving China or remaining there.
abstract: Helen T Verongos reviews movie New York, New York, directed by Luo Dong.
